docters.name: Dr. Vijay Agarwal
docters.information: MD, MRCP, PhD,CCT Lead & Sr. Consultant - Medical Oncology & Haematology
docters.experienceInfo: Dr. Vijay Agarwal is a Senior Consultant Medical Oncologist with over 12 years of experience in Oncology. Dr. Agarwal has been practising Medical Oncology since 2004.
